title: Home
lyrics:
Since God will be my Shepherd
Oh, I won't need a thing
He leads the way before me
Restores my soul to sing
You lift my head from sorrow

And turn my mourning into joy



So I won't fear what evil brings

For You are with me

And You lay my anxious heart to rest

When I am with You



Oh, even through the valley

Oh, You are holding me

Your beauty is overflowing

Your face is all I see



You lift my head from sorrow

And turn my mourning into joy



So I won't fear what evil brings

For You are with me

You lay my anxious heart to rest

When I am with You



I am home in the house of God

Yes, I'm home

I am home in the house of God

Yes, I'm home

I am home in the house of God

Yes, I'm home

I am home in the house of God

Yes, I'm home



So I won't fear what evil brings

For You are with me

You lay my anxious heart to rest

When I am with You
